Articles.Content:
I made this plane today, using twin Whiplash engines, to explore the ice caps of kerbin, I got lost because of the NavBall, but maybe you guys can finesse some better results out of her? (small flight note: its VERY sensitive to both yawing and rolling movements, and is poor in U-turns, so maybe iron that out).

https://imgur.com/a/0PX2o

It IS good at climbing though, and handles quite nicely when not turning or spinning.

Two pictures not a very comprehensive study of your plane does make.

 

When does it turn or spin?

It is very sensitive to yaw (turn) and roll (spin) inputs.

then again most of my planes are sensitive to that as well.
